original_text: Tamar knew that Judah's son Shelah had now become a man. But Judah had not yet let Shelah marry her. So Tamar took off her widow's clothes and she put on other clothes. She covered her head with a veil. She did not want anyone to recognize her. Then she sat at the gate of Enaim. Enaim is a town on the road that goes to Timnah.
korean_text: 그가 그 과부의 의복을 벗고 너울로 얼굴을 가리고 몸을 휩싸고 딤나 길 곁 에나임 문에 앉으니 이는 셀라가 장성함을 보았어도 자기를 그의 아내로 주지 않음으로 말미암음이라

sentences.original_text: that Judah's son Shelah had now become a man
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 아들 셀라가 이제 어른이 되었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: But Judah had not yet let Shelah marry her
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 유다는 아직 셀라가 그녀와 결혼하게 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: So Tamar took off her widow's clothes
and she put on other clothes
She covered her head with a veil
She did not want anyone to recognize her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 아무도 그녀를 알아보지 못하게 하고 싶지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Then she sat at the gate of Enaim
on the road that goes to Timnah
